00020 #define BSWAP(a) { \
00021                 unsigned int _temp0,_temp1,_temp2,_temp3,_temp4;\
00022                 _temp1=(a & 0xFF00FF00)>>8;\
00023                 _temp0=(a & 0x00FF00FF)<<8;\
00024                 _temp2=_temp0+_temp1;\
00025                 _temp3=(_temp2 & 0x0000FFFF)<<16;\
00026                 _temp4=(_temp2 & 0xFFFF0000)>>16;\
00027                      a=_temp3+_temp4;\
00028                 }

00287 #if defined( _DEBUG ) || defined( DEBUG )
00288 #define CHECK( exp )      ASSERT( exp )
00289 #define AOT_DBG( exp )    AOT( exp )
00290 #define AOF_DBG( exp )    AOF( exp )
00291 #define ANOK_DBG( exp )   ANOK( exp )
00292 #define DO_DBG( exp )     ( exp )
00293 #else  // _DEBUG
00294 #define CHECK( exp )      ((VOID_TYPE)( exp ))
00295 #define AOT_DBG( exp )    ((VOID_TYPE)0)
00296 #define AOF_DBG( exp )    ((VOID_TYPE)0)
